articles.title: Cynthia Koh remembers her promise to wear 'nothing at all' if she wins a Star Award - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The actress, known for her daring outfits, posted a picture of herself in the buff – just not what you'd expect.
articles.content:
Before the Star Awards on Apr 24, Cynthia Koh boldly stated that if she won a Top 10 Most Popular Female Artistes award, she would "wear nothing at all".
She made the statement at a press conference… [+575 chars]

articles.title: COVID-19 Vaccine Technique Shows Promise For Heart Disease - Eurasia Review
articles.description: A method for delivering genetic material to the body is being tested as a way to repair damaged heart muscle
articles.content: A method for delivering genetic material to the body is being tested as a way to repair damaged heart muscle after a heart attack. The ground-breaking research is presented at Frontiers in CardioVasc… [+2307 chars]
